org.openimaj.image.processing.face.tracking

Class KLTHaarFaceTracker

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.image.processing.face.tracking.KLTHaarFaceTracker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FaceTracker<org.openimaj.image.FImage>

    public class KLTHaarFaceTracker
extends Object
implements FaceTracker<org.openimaj.image.FImage>
    A face tracker that uses the HaarCascadeDetector to detect faces in the image and then tracks them using the KLTTracker.
    Author:
    David Dupplaw (dpd@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      KLTHaarFaceTracker(int minSize)
      Default constructor that takes the minimum size (in pixels) of detections that should be considered faces.

      • KLTHaarFaceTracker

    • Method Detail

      • trackFace

        public List<DetectedFace> trackFace(org.openimaj.image.FImage img)
        Given the image, can a face be tracked on the image. The implementation must deal with finding the face in the first place, if this is the first frame it's seen, and it must deal with storage of state as the tracking takes place.
        Specified by:
        trackFace in interface FaceTracker<org.openimaj.image.FImage>
        Parameters:
        img - The image to track a face in
        Returns:
        A list of detected/tracked faces which could be empty if no faces are found in the image.
        See Also:
        FaceTracker.trackFace(org.openimaj.image.Image)

        public int getForceRetry()
        Returns:
        the forceRetry

        public void setForceRetry(int forceRetry)
        Parameters:
        forceRetry - the forceRetry to set
